nowFeed.headline: FSU's Braian Angola grew up in Colombia. He came to the United States in 2012. Angola describes his journey, his JC days at North Idaho College (Coeur d'Alene, ID), and what it meant to play in front of his family.
nowFeed.story: FSU's Braian Angola grew up in Colombia. He came to the United States in 2012. Angola describes his journey, his JC days at North Idaho College (Coeur d'Alene, ID), and what it meant to play in front of his family.

nowFeed.headline: After Saturday's win over Xavier, Villanova's Jay Wright said Phil Booth (11.6 PPG, 43 percent from the  3-point line) could play limited minutes against DePaul on Wednesday.
nowFeed.story: After Saturday's win over Xavier, Villanova's Jay Wright said Phil Booth (11.6 PPG, 43 percent from the  3-point line) could play limited minutes against DePaul on Wednesday.

nowFeed.headline: Via @ESPNStatsInfo: The +33 edge in free throw attempts for Kansas against West Virginia was its largest-ever against a Big 12 opponent. It went +33 against Emporia State in 1997 and +31 against Oklahoma State last season.
nowFeed.story: Via @ESPNStatsInfo: The +33 edge in free throw attempts for Kansas against West Virginia was its largest-ever against a Big 12 opponent. It went +33 against Emporia State in 1997 and +31 against Oklahoma State last season.

nowFeed.headline: West Virginia has now blown a double-digit second-half lead to lose in each of its last three games against Kansas.
nowFeed.story: West Virginia has now blown a double-digit second-half lead to lose in each of its last three games against Kansas.

nowFeed.headline: Minnesota sophomore Amir Coffey will undergo season-ending surgery on his right shoulder and miss the remainder of the season. Has missed the last five games and 10 games total. Was averaging 14.0 points.
nowFeed.story: Minnesota sophomore Amir Coffey will undergo season-ending surgery on his right shoulder and miss the remainder of the season. Has missed the last five games and 10 games total. Was averaging 14.0 points.

nowFeed.headline: Trevon Bluiett has 63 points on 25 shots in his last two games. That's absurd.
nowFeed.story: Trevon Bluiett has 63 points on 25 shots in his last two games. That's absurd.

nowFeed.headline: Down the stretch, Jay Wright will have to manage Mikal Bridges and Eric Paschall, both with four fouls. This is where Trevon Bluiett is at his best. He'll just keep attacking and drawing fouls and nibbling at this lead if Nova can't stay in front of him.
nowFeed.story: Down the stretch, Jay Wright will have to manage Mikal Bridges and Eric Paschall, both with four fouls. This is where Trevon Bluiett is at his best. He'll just keep attacking and drawing fouls and nibbling at this lead if Nova can't stay in front of him.

nowFeed.headline: Double technical fouls on Omari Spellman and Paul Scruggs after their brief confrontation. Surprised this didn't happen earlier in the game. Lot of trash talk. Huge fourth foul for Scruggs, too.
nowFeed.story: Double technical fouls on Omari Spellman and Paul Scruggs after their brief confrontation. Surprised this didn't happen earlier in the game. Lot of trash talk. Huge fourth foul for Scruggs, too.

nowFeed.headline: Mikal Bridges was the biggest problem for Xavier in the first half. JP Macura couldn't stay with him. Naji Marshall, a lengthy, 6-7 combo forward is on him to start the second half. That's slowing Nova's offense.
nowFeed.story: Mikal Bridges was the biggest problem for Xavier in the first half. JP Macura couldn't stay with him. Naji Marshall, a lengthy, 6-7 combo forward is on him to start the second half. That's slowing Nova's offense.

nowFeed.headline: Important to note that Villanova only connected on 15 of its 53 attempts (28.3 percent) from beyond the arc in the last three games. Made 58 percent (11-for-19) in the first half at Xavier.
nowFeed.story: Important to note that Villanova only connected on 15 of its 53 attempts (28.3 percent) from beyond the arc in the last three games. Made 58 percent (11-for-19) in the first half at Xavier.

nowFeed.headline: Since Xavier came into the Big East in 2013, Villanova is 9-1 against the Musketeers with wins coming by an average of 17.6 points.
nowFeed.story: Since Xavier came into the Big East in 2013, Villanova is 9-1 against the Musketeers with wins coming by an average of 17.6 points.

nowFeed.headline: Phil Booth's injury is significant for this Villanova squad, especially on the defensive end. The Wildcats have held opponents to just 0.95 points per possession (29.8 percent from the 3-point line), while creating turnovers on more than one-fifth of their possessions, per hooplens.com. Much harder to run players off the 3-point line and guard the perimeter without the guard.
nowFeed.story: Phil Booth's injury is significant for this Villanova squad, especially on the defensive end. The Wildcats have held opponents to just 0.95 points per possession (29.8 percent from the 3-point line), while creating turnovers on more than one-fifth of their possessions, per hooplens.com. Much harder to run players off the 3-point line and guard the perimeter without the guard.

nowFeed.headline: Marvin Bagley III is out again for Duke tomorrow. Will be his third straight missed game.
nowFeed.story: Marvin Bagley III is out again for Duke tomorrow. Will be his third straight missed game.

nowFeed.headline: Northwestern scores 11 second-half points and blows a 27-point lead to fall to Michigan State, 65-60. Wildcats missed 17 straight shots at one point.
